name: New York City
description: The 'Big Apple' and a historic epicenter for professional wrestling. From the bright lights of Times Square to the grit of the boroughs, it's the ultimate stage.

name: Mexico City Megaplex
description: The Lucha Libre capital of the 21st through 23rd centuries. Where Rey Jaguar unified the world titles in 2034 AD.

name: London
description: A hub for the European wrestling scene, known for its rowdy, singing crowds and a mix of technical and hard-hitting styles.

name: Chicago
description: The 'Windy City', home to some of the most passionate and vocal wrestling fans in the world. A true blue-collar wrestling town.

name: Pittsburgh Citadel
description: The 23rd-century evolution of the Steel City. Hails the legacy of Kurt Angle. Known for its industrial strength and 'Wrestling Machine' academy.

name: Winnipeg Cryo-Hub
description: A high-tech Canadian city in the 22nd and 23rd centuries. Home to the Felix wrestling dynasty and the Alpha Pack.

name: Calgary Spire
description: The legendary home of the Hart family and the 'Loose Cannon' Brian Pillman. A center for technical brilliance and unpredictable energy.

name: Toronto
description: A major Canadian hub for wrestling, hosting massive international spectacles and fostering a rich independent scene.

name: New Orleans
description: The 'Big Easy', known for its unique culture and for hosting some of the most memorable championship moments in history.

name: Osaka Cyber-District
description: The futuristic birthplace of Oda Tsuguri (born 2361 AD). A neon-drenched district where the Oda clan still holds sway.

name: Neo-Tokyo
description: A sprawling cyberpunk metropolis in the 23rd century, rebuilt after the Great Collapse. A hub for tech and underground fighting.

name: Zambezi Sanctuary
description: A lush, technologically advanced kingdom along the Zambezi River, restored to its 10th-century glory by time-displaced technology.

name: Uruk Eternal
description: The ancient city of Mesopotamia, reconstructed in the 23rd century as a living museum and battleground for the Redeemed King, Gilgamesh.

name: Siberian Outpost
description: A harsh, sub-zero prison and training ground in Russia. The birthplace of OMZ's 'Knockout Artist' persona.

name: Ugandan Wilds
description: A protected ecological zone in the 23rd century, echoing the homeland of the Ugandan Giant, Kamala.

name: Slamtown
description: The fictional, yet very real, sovereign state governed by Johnny All Time. A place where gravity is optional.

name: Neo-London Spire
description: A towering vertical city in the UK, preserving the grit and glory of British wrestling tradition.

name: Neo-Paris Sky-Garden
description: A floating garden city above the ruins of old Paris, celebrating art, beauty, and the legacy of Andre the Giant.

name: Lunar Colony Alpha
description: Humanity's first permanent settlement on the Moon, a hub for zero-gravity sports and corporate intrigue.

name: Amazonian Canopy-City
description: A breathtaking vertical city built within the giant trees of the restored Amazon rainforest. A marvel of ecological engineering.

name: Atlantis Reborn
description: A fully submerged city beneath the Atlantic, a marvel of bio-engineering and marine architecture.

name: Perth
description: A vibrant coastal city in Western Australia, known for its passionate sports fans and stunning modern architecture.

name: Melbourne
description: The sporting capital of Australia, with a rich history of hosting massive international spectacles and a very vocal wrestling community.

name: San Juan
description: The historic and vibrant capital of Puerto Rico, a legendary territory where wrestling is part of the cultural fabric.

name: Riyadh
description: The booming capital of Saudi Arabia, a new global hub for massive international wrestling events and high-production spectacles.

name: Jeddah
description: A historic port city on the Red Sea, now home to some of the world's most unique and technologically advanced sporting venues.
